flowRoot.flowPara: そら ね ごらん

flowPara.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:500;font-stretch:normal;font-size:14.125px;line-height:172.03500271%;font-family:'Yue Print Mincho Sml';-inkscape-font-specification:'Yue Print Mincho Sml Medium';text-align:start;letter-spacing:-1.64999998px;writing-mode:tb-rl;text-anchor:start;fill:#000000;fill-opacity:1

flowRoot.flowPara: むかふに にぬれてゐる

flowPara.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:500;font-stretch:normal;font-size:14.125px;line-height:172.03500271%;font-family:'Yue Print Mincho Sml';-inkscape-font-specification:'Yue Print Mincho Sml Medium';text-align:start;letter-spacing:-1.64999998px;writing-mode:tb-rl;text-anchor:start;fill:#000000;fill-opacity:1

flowRoot.flowPara: のかたちのちひさな があるだらう

flowPara.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:500;font-stretch:normal;font-size:14.125px;line-height:172.03500271%;font-family:'Yue Print Mincho Sml';-inkscape-font-specification:'Yue Print Mincho Sml Medium';text-align:start;letter-spacing:-1.64999998px;writing-mode:tb-rl;text-anchor:start;fill:#000000;fill-opacity:1

flowRoot.flowPara: ずゐぶんはやく れて つて

flowPara.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:500;font-stretch:normal;font-size:14.125px;line-height:172.03500271%;font-family:'Yue Print Mincho Sml';-inkscape-font-specification:'Yue Print Mincho Sml Medium';text-align:start;letter-spacing:-1.64999998px;writing-mode:tb-rl;text-anchor:start;fill:#000000;fill-opacity:1

flowRoot.flowPara: け んでゐるのだよ

flowPara.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:500;font-stretch:normal;font-size:14.125px;line-height:172.03500271%;font-family:'Yue Print Mincho Sml';-inkscape-font-specification:'Yue Print Mincho Sml Medium';text-align:start;letter-spacing:-1.64999998px;writing-mode:tb-rl;text-anchor:start;fill:#000000;fill-opacity:1

flowRoot.flowPara: こゝいらはふきの でいつぱいだ
MHere, there are many fuki flowers.
is ane wee puddock-stuil shapit shaw.
MHere, there are mony fuki flooers.
Across from here, damp with mist,
Owre fae here, drowie wi myst,
